comments.author: bhavesh jogi
comments.content:
When i deploy my WAR file in tomcat and run in browser that time its give me error like this.

When i run this in eclipse its run very well.

Can you help me how to solve this?

comments.author: Otis Gospodnetic
comments.content: Please ask on the Solr user mailing list.
